content: अनुसंधानं {@--1@} Inquiry, investigation; close inspection or scrutiny, examination; <ls>Mv. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Aiming at. <ls>H.</ls> {@--3@} Planning, arranging, getting ready &c.; दुर्गानुसंधाने को नियुज्यतां <ls>H. 3</ls> equipping with the necessary materials. {@--4@} A plan, scheme. {@--5@} Suitable connection. {@--6@} (In the <ls>Vaiś.</ls> <ab>phil.</ab>) The 4th step in a syllogism, the उपनय or application.
